name: Pixel Bob!
description:
Watch out for those darn Pixel Bots! Play as Pixel Bob and change colors as you cruise through space and earn points. Think you got what it takes to beat your high score? Well, think again! Jump through Pixel Towers to earn points. The more Pixel Towers that you successfully jump through, the higher your score! Be careful, though, as hitting the Pixel Towers will cause you to slow down, rotate through space, and be consumed by the Pixel Bots! What could be better than changing colors and jumping through our solar system while running away from pixelated bots?

Are you ready to handle the challenge? DOWNLOAD & INSTALL PIXEL BOB! NOW!

What others have to say about Pixel Bob!:

"One of the best games currently on the Android Market."

"Classic game that you can't put down!"

"Original, creative, and unlike anything else."

You won't be able to put Pixel Bob! down. Download NOW!
